column4: hey guys, having some problems getting my wireless card to work.  I think the problem is that ubuntu isn't seeing pcmcia devices.  How can I confirm that?
type lspci and see if there are any references to it
paste the lspci output at www.pasetbin.com and give me the link to your post
have any other pcmcia cards to try?
plug it and unplug it, then type dmesg | tail and paste at pastebin
it seems you are right, i have no workarounds there
nope, it'a a 4 year old laptop
what's diff hardware detection wise with a live cd?
some distros detectt some hw others not
So try a differnt distro live cd?  I DL'd a ubuntu live iso but haven't played with it yet.
